plot: Julian Van der Screwd is a hedonistic son of a wealthy plantation owner. He inspires the wrath of Clara, a hoodoo witch doctor slave, when he gets several slaves on the plantation pregnant....
title: Julian's Balls
plot_es: Julian Van der Screwd is a hedonistic son of a wealthy plantation owner. He inspires the wrath of Clara, a hoodoo witch doctor slave, when he gets several slaves on the plantation pregnant....
plot_en: Julian Van der Screwd is a hedonistic son of a wealthy plantation owner. He inspires the wrath of Clara, a hoodoo witch doctor slave, when he gets several slaves on the plantation pregnant....
